meanings.definition: A game played with five pins.
meanings.sent1: We played a fun game of fivepins at the park.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed playing fivepins during recess.
meanings.sent3: The fivepins game got so competitive that we all started laughing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fivepins, every pin represents a different challenge.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fivepins falling echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: A set of five pins used in bowling.
meanings.sent1: The bowling alley had shiny fivepins lined up for the next game.
meanings.sent2: She knocked down all fivepins with a single throw.
meanings.sent3: The fivepins in the bowling lane looked like soldiers standing in a row.
meanings.sent4: The fivepins stood tall, ready to be knocked down by the bowling ball.
meanings.sent5: The bowler aimed carefully at the fivepins, hoping for a strike.
